title: End-to-End Business Automation & Invoicing Platform
text: Designed and developed a complete sales-to-invoice automation system integrated with Microsoft Dynamics 365. Built scalable backend services to handle sales orders, line items, and automated invoice generation, reducing manual effort and processing time by 70%.

title: IoT Device Management & Monitoring Dashboard (PWA)
text: Enterprise-grade Progressive Web App for monitoring and managing IoT devices in real time. Implemented MQTT-based communication, Node-RED automation workflows, secure Auth0 authentication, and Dockerized deployments for scalability.

title: Scalable Backend API Platform
text: Built and optimized secure RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js for high-volume data transactions. Implemented JWT-based authentication, database optimization techniques, and modular service architecture.

title: Full Stack Web Applications
text: Developed multiple responsive web applications using React.js and Vue.js with clean UI and optimized backend services. Focused on performance, maintainability, and real-world business use cases.
